categories: Category:Star Wars: The Clone Wars home video releases

nodes.text: Star Wars: The Clone Wars The Complete Season Three

Star Wars: The Clone Wars The Complete Season Three is a three-disc Blu-ray or four-disc DVD set of the 2010–2011 third season of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series. It was released by Warner Home Video on October 18, 2011.

Star Wars: The Clone Wars The Complete Season Three was released in a standard slipcase format, different from the first two seasons, which received box sets with interior booklets. The remaining series' home-video releases followed the Season Three slipcase format.
The DVD version includes some hidden easter eggs:
